Uses of Package
org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt

  • Packages that use org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt 
    Package Description
    org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt
    The core APIs of Page Flow Runtime.
    org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt.impl
    The Implementation for core APIs of Page Flow Runtime.
    org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.hst.sitemapitemhandler
    HstSiteMapItemHandler implementation(s) to integrate an HST based web application with Page Flow Module.
  • Classes in org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt used by org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt 
    Class and Description
    ErrorItem
    Error Item abstraction which is part of Errors.
    Errors
    Errors abstraction for an application subject (e.g, a field in a form of an application).
    PageFlow
    Page Flow runtime abstraction.
    PageFlowControl
    Page Flow Control abstraction, which provides applications with an easier way to retrieve the current PageFlow instance from the HttpServletRequest, to send redirection to a specific PageState and to complete a PageFlow.
    PageFlowFactory
    Factory abstraction which is responsible for creating a PageFlow instance from a PageFlowDefinition.
    PageFlowStore
    Backend Page Flow Store abstraction.
    PageState
    Page State runtime abstraction, which is part of a PageFlow.
  • Classes in org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt used by org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt.impl 
    Class and Description
    ErrorItem
    Error Item abstraction which is part of Errors.
    Errors
    Errors abstraction for an application subject (e.g, a field in a form of an application).
    PageFlow
    Page Flow runtime abstraction.
    PageFlowFactory
    Factory abstraction which is responsible for creating a PageFlow instance from a PageFlowDefinition.
    PageFlowStore
    Backend Page Flow Store abstraction.
    PageState
    Page State runtime abstraction, which is part of a PageFlow.
  • Classes in org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.core.rt used by org.onehippo.forge.pageflow.hst.sitemapitemhandler 
    Class and Description
    DefaultPageFlowControl
    Default generic PageFlowControl implementation in a web application.
    PageFlow
    Page Flow runtime abstraction.
    PageFlowControl
    Page Flow Control abstraction, which provides applications with an easier way to retrieve the current PageFlow instance from the HttpServletRequest, to send redirection to a specific PageState and to complete a PageFlow.
    PageFlowFactory
    Factory abstraction which is responsible for creating a PageFlow instance from a PageFlowDefinition.
    PageFlowStore
    Backend Page Flow Store abstraction.
    PageState
    Page State runtime abstraction, which is part of a PageFlow.
